title: 이달의소녀탐구 #422 (LOONA TV #422)
summary:
The episode starts off with the group dance.
0:23 -- HeeJin (her hair is a mess): "Shooting a group dance on the rooftop is over..." - Chuu: "It was fun"
0:27 -- HeeJin mentions how warm the weather was. Chuu: "Hot, hot!"
0:39 -- ViVi: "I'm feeling like I'm on a frying pan..."
0:46 -- Choerry has ice on her head. "It's quite cool!"
0:53 -- Go Won talks about the heat and
Go Won smh at 0:55.
